originalText.text: I came to Village Gyrotonic 2 years ago after I had surgery for 3 herniated discs. I had read that this type of exercise is much better for healing than traditional Physical Therapy alone. Lauren is the best trainer I could have asked for. Her knowledge of the human body is mind blowing and she was able to strengthen my body and get to a much better place physically than before surgery. I was amazed at how knowledgeable she is and how she is able get to the core of my problems. I go weekly and its done wonders for my core strength and movement. I am so happy that I found Village Gyrotonic and Lauren as they've become a fixture in my fitness journey. I can't recommend it to my friends and family enough...anytime someone comes to me with an issue in their body, this is the first place I tell them to incorporate into their healing journey. It's a good addition for very physically fit people, like my marathoner husband, to correct small issues that arise due to over activity.

originalText.text: After decades of working out at gyms, and because of my age and a back issue, I started Gyrotonics last year.  It has become my primary form of movement. It is subtle but very evident that my body is stronger because of it!  I just completed a very physically challenging apartment move.  I was able to pack, lift boxes, unpack, etc. with zero complications.  My instructor Lauren is amazing.  Village Gyrotonic is my new HAPPY PLACE ❤️

originalText.text: Village Gyrotonic provides a relaxing atmosphere and the ability to improve coordination and muscle-controlled movements. I have worked with Jamila and thoroughly enjoyed my sessions each week. I highly recommend that everyone stops by for a session to increase their flexibility, alignment, and release tension pain.

text.text: Village Gyrotonic provides a relaxing atmosphere and the ability to improve coordination and muscle-controlled movements. I have worked with Jamila and thoroughly enjoyed my sessions each week. I highly recommend that everyone stops by for a session to increase their flexibility, alignment, and release tension pain.

originalText.text: I have been a regular client of VG for 9 years.  It is the one practice I’ll never abandon because it offers so many benefits for strength, flexibility, alignment and even the alleviation of muscle soreness caused by injury.  I primarily work with Jamila at the studio but all the teachers are equally great as is the incredibly attentive studio manager, Zoe.

text.text: I have been a regular client of VG for 9 years.  It is the one practice I’ll never abandon because it offers so many benefits for strength, flexibility, alignment and even the alleviation of muscle soreness caused by injury.  I primarily work with Jamila at the studio but all the teachers are equally great as is the incredibly attentive studio manager, Zoe.

originalText.text: Honestly, I just love this little Gem of a studio. The studio is tended to by Zoe who makes every one feel so warm and welcome. I study in a semi-private format with Jamila who is present, knowledgable and engaged. She also is great with anatomy and is adept at providing personalized attention. As a long time yoga practitioner and former dancer, I am loving learning a new technique and am finding Gyrotonics immensely helpful and body smart.
